-1.title: Die Laaste Trooi
-1.plot: The neighbourhood has seen better days. Johan has to win back his wife, save the neighbourhood watch and stand up to Molendorf. Don's house of cards comes crashing down, while Tobie and Lisa is faces some big decisions.

1.title: Langnaweek
1.plot: The Besters' move to a Cape Town suburb hasn't been the smoothest transition, but nothing could prepare them for the chain of events that start with them crossing paths with their local buurtwag. Tobie arrives back in his old hometown but realises soon enough that things have changed.

2.title: Kinders
2.plot: The Besters are still basking in the afterglow of their big news when reality high tackles them. Johan sees his first bit of action on neighbourhood watch patrol, while Tobie runs into a few ghosts of his past.

3.title: Vriende
3.plot: Things become tense when Johan invites a new member to join the neighbourhood watch. Gert needs to cross his own personal rubicon, while Tobie enjoys some quality time with a married woman.

4.title: Code Red
4.plot: Johan and Ayanda's testosterone fueled bravery evaporates as they get their first emercency call while on patrol. The neighbourhood sees some heavy action and everybody gets involved. Tobie's sessions with Frandi send him on his own midnight adventure.

5.title: Die Petisie
5.plot: The guys finally cross paths with the media, but learn the hard way that any PR isn't good PR. Johan is still in the dogbox about his reckless behaviour during "the incident", even though Yolandie only knows half the story. Luckilly she's also got a secret or two.

6.title: Die Sambreel
6.plot: Yolandie and Frandi decide to do something about the grafitti in die neighbourhood. Don chooses an inopportune night to go on patrol again, while Tobie and the laaities' get-together in the park snowballs into a misunderstanding of epic proportions.

7.title: Fotogeleentheid
7.plot: After the guys' recent discretions Don has them on lockdown, making the neighbourhood watch a lot less fun. Gert's financial woes have led him into a new scheme, while Tobie unwittingly crashes into his destiny. Literally.

8.title: Rebelle
8.plot: With the neighbourhood watch in tatters, Don follows his ego into the umbrella organisation's first meeting. Johan accidentally becomes the voice of corporate development, while Tobie takes Lisa on a picnic.

9.title: Stilte voor die Strom
9.plot: Don confronts Gert about Tobie and Lisa's recent night time escapades. Yolandie hosts an impromtu traditional Sunday luncheon for the neighbours. Fresh clues lead Captain Fredericks to Don's door.

10.title: Werkloos
10.plot: Johan avoids reality (and Yolandie) by hiding out at Gert and Tobie's place. The guys go on aimless afternoon joyrides while Tobie looks for work. Yolandie tries to do something about her cabin fever.

11.title: Die Grens
11.plot: Loadshedding spoils another day in suburbia. Tobie takes Lisa along on one of his more dubious errands. The guys finally confront Gert about his finances. Clive spends some quality time with the ladies.

12.title: Die Mannes is Honger
12.plot: The neighbourdhood is in mourning. Johan's lies finally catch up with him. The tide turns against Don and he takes matters into his own hands. Tobie and Lisa's relationship takes a dramatic turnThe neighbourdhood is in mourning. Johan's lies finally catch up with him. The tide turns against Don and he takes matters into his own hands. Tobie and Lisa's relationship takes a dramatic turn.

imdb.plot outline: Die Buurtwag (The Neighborhood Watch) is the story of a young married couple who, because of their fear of crime in Gauteng, sacrifices their salaries and moves to a Cape Town suburb. The Cape, however, turns out to be a cruel mountain mistress. After three months in their new home they still haven't made any friends and to make matters worse, they lose everything they own when their house is burgled while they're out camping for a long weekend. This kicks off a chain of events that introduces them to their local neighborhood watch- a motley mob of misfits who use the excuse of neighborhood safety to patrol the streets at night looking for whatever excitement the suburbs have to offer. Set against the backdrop of post-recession South Africa, Die Buurtwag is the story of strangers becoming a community, and with a society that seems to be getting stranger by the day, learning that survival is a team sport and that places aren't safe, but people just might be.
imdb.title: Buurtwag
plot: _Buurtwag_ (qv) (The Neighborhood Watch) is about a motley collection of individuals in a modern South African suburb coming together to form an a-typical neighborhood watch.

Die _Buurtwag_ (qv) (The Neighborhood Watch) is the story of a young married couple who, because of their fear of crime in Gauteng, sacrifices their salaries and moves to a Cape Town suburb. The Cape, however, turns out to be a cruel mountain mistress. After three months in their new home they still haven't made any friends and to make matters worse, they lose everything they own when their house is burgled while they're out camping for a long weekend. This kicks off a chain of events that introduces them to their local neighborhood watch- a motley mob of misfits who use the excuse of neighborhood safety to patrol the streets at night looking for whatever excitement the suburbs have to offer. Set against the backdrop of post-recession South Africa, Die _Buurtwag_ (qv) is the story of strangers becoming a community, and with a society that seems to be getting stranger by the day, learning that survival is a team sport and that places aren't safe, but people just might be.
